name: babel-plugin-transform-react-jsx-component-data-ids
description: Adds data attribute to every element with a component name and optional label, to assist with using Shepherd.js.

scripts.test: npm run prepublish && babel test/in.js --out-file=test/out.js --plugins=syntax-jsx,../lib/index && diff -r test/out.js test/expected.js

author: First People's Cultural Council
